value.description: Officials have identified the two men killed in a shooting in downtown Minneapolis over the weekend that also left eight others injured.

value.name: Dallas County Sheriff Office donates 2 vehicles to Uniontown Police Department
value.description: The Dallas County Sheriff Office recently donated two of its older vehicles to the Uniontown Police Department. Dallas County Sheriff Mike Granthum and members of the Dallas County Commission made the presentation to Uniontown Mayor Christopher Jones and Uniontown Police Chief Robert Cole last week at the Dallas County Courthouse.

value.name: Conservatives storm to thumping victory in Cleveland Police & Crime Commissioner election
value.description: Mr Turner secured 74,023 votes, with Labour's Matt Storey getting 39,467. Christopher Jones from the Lib Dems secured 6,540 votes, with independent Barrie Cooper getting 16,667. The turnout was 33.7%.
